#summary Translate Data Quota.
#labels Featured

To update a translation, please copy the contents of the correct file, linked in the table below, and translate the strings in quotes on the right. [http://code.google.com/p/dataquota/issues/entry Create a new issue] and attach the file and we will include it in the next release.

If you want to translate to a language not already in the list below, please do so. You can take any language below as the base language. Again, [http://code.google.com/p/dataquota/issues/entry create a new issue] and attach the file letting us know which language it is and we will include it in the next release.

If possible, please attach the file encoded as "UTF-8 without BOM". We find [http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net Notepad++] is a very easy application for this.

Thanks very much in advance!
